content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "P.I." TV series – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(June 2017)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*2017 Singaporean TV series or program ***P.I.*** sometimes referred to as ***Private Investigator*** is a Singaporean crime/thriller drama starring [Carl Ng](/wiki/Carl_Ng), Vanessa Vanderstraaten, [Karylle](/wiki/Karylle), Kathiravan Kandavelu, Joyce Ng, Najib Soiman and Shane Mardjuki. The series premiered on MediaCorp TV Channel 5 on January 9, 2017. ## Plot This article **needs a plot summary.** Please add one in your own words. *(September 2019)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* ## Cast ### Main cast - [Carl Ng](/wiki/Carl_Ng) as Donny Lai - Vanessa Vanderstraaten as Christine Yeoh-Ong - [Karylle](/wiki/Karylle) as Maia Yap - Kathiravan as Mozzie - Najib Soiman as Bruno - Joyce Ng as Rabbit Warrior ### Supporting cast - Shane Mardjuki as Sam Ong - Kaidon Lee Jinyan as Josh - Silvarajoo as Captain Aru - Atyy Malek as Hannah - Taufio Saleh as Insp. Amin - Audrey Lim as Cpl. Sharon - Doreen Choo as Lizzy - Soraya Buchanan as Mrs Olivero - Jed Senthul as Mr. Raja ### Special guest - Terence Tay as Wilson - Robin Leong as Pedro - Isaac Chua as Michael - Adele Wong as Cheryl C - Derrick Ee as Ah Seng ## Episodes This section **needs a plot summary.** Please add one in your own words. *(November 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*No.TitleOriginal release date1"Honesty’s The Best Agency"January 9, 2017 (2017-01-09)2"Honey Trap"January 10, 2017 (2017-01-10)3"Hard Drive"January 11, 2017 (2017-01-11)4"Sex, Lies, and a Gun to the Head"January 12, 2017 (2017-01-12)5"V"January 16, 2017 (2017-01-16)6"Runaround"January 17, 2017 (2017-01-17)7"In Friends We Trust"January 18, 2017 (2017-01-18)8"Wolf in Sheep's Clothing"January 19, 2017 (2017-01-19)9"Shallow Grave"January 23, 2017 (2017-01-23)10"Liar Liar"January 24, 2017 (2017-01-24)11"Trust No One"January 25, 2017 (2017-01-25)12"Things Fall Apart"January 26, 2017 (2017-01-26)13"Full Circle"January 31, 2017 (2017-01-31) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
